content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the case involved a matrimonial property dispute between two parties referred to as fb and jb the applicant fb requested that the court dissolve the marriage and divide the property they renounced their share of the property and requested that it be awarded solely to the defendant jb without compensation fb also requested that jb pay the costs of secondary legal aid the defendant did not respond to the claim or appear in court the court granted the application dissolved the marriage and ordered the division of the property jb was awarded the dwelling house woodshed shed barn and well they were also ordered to pay a debt through enforcement proceedings cover the stamp duty and procedural costs and pay the costs of secondary legal aid

metadata.cost: 110.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 51.00 EUR (proffesional fees) to be borne by the defendant
